data.summary: Persona 5 Royal is the extended and upgraded version of the newest mainline game in the well know...
data.game_display_settings:
#### Graphics Settings:
- **Rendering Scale:** 100%
- **Shadow Quality:** Medium
- **Framerate Limit:** 60
- **Anti-Aliasing:** SMAA
- **Depth of Field:** High
#### Display Settings:
- **Resolution:** 1280x800

data.additional_notes:
#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


Persona 5 Royal is an incredible game in itself and a must have on the Steam Deck!
- **Performance:** ★★★★★ (5/5))
- **Visuals:** ★★★★★ (5/5)
- **Stability:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
- **Controls:** ★★★★★ (5/5)
- **Battery:** ★★★★★ (5/5)
